Class Keyboard

java.lang.Object
Model.Keyboard
public class Keyboard extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Keyboard()
    Creates a keyboard object by representing each letter with its current status in a hashmap

  • Constructor Details

    • Keyboard

      public Keyboard()
      Creates a keyboard object by representing each letter with its current status in a hashmap

  • Method Details

    • resetKeyboardStatus

      public void resetKeyboardStatus()
      Resets the keyboard status to gray.

    • markStatus

      public void markStatus(Character letter, LetterStatus status)
      Marks a current keyboard with a specific keyboard status
      Parameters:
      letter - a character representing a key
      status - a enum representing the letter's status pertaining to its comparison with the wordle answer.

    • updateKeyboardStatus

      public void updateKeyboardStatus(UserGuess userGuess, WordleAnswer answer)
      Updates the keyboard by indexing through user guess string
      Parameters:
      userGuess - a UserGuess object containing user's guess
      answer - a WordleAnswer object containing the answer to the wordle game

    • getKeyMap

      public HashMap<Character, LetterStatus> getKeyMap()
      gets a key map corresponding the keyboard key and it's status
      Returns:
      a HashMap object containing the character mapped to its status on the keyboard
